description: This file is a shell script (.sh) used for managing the download, extraction, installation, verification, and updating of application bundles within a software project. It includes functions for downloading application packages, extracting content, verifying signatures, executing post-install scripts, and handling overall update logic based on bundle list inputs.

methods.name: downloadApp
methods.description: Downloads the application package from the download location to the application's download directory.

methods.name: extractApp
methods.description: Extracts the signed tar and package files into the application download directory, with sanity checks.

methods.name: installApp
methods.description: Installs the application by fetching package metadata, moving files to the appropriate directory, and extracting package contents.

methods.name: searchApp
methods.description: Finds the download and installation paths for a given application name.

methods.name: verifyAppSignature
methods.description: Verifies the application package's digital signature using an external script.

methods.name: postVerifyInstall
methods.description: Executes any post-installation scripts specified in the package metadata.

methods.name: updatePkgStatus
methods.description: Broadcasts the package status (e.g., installed, error) with details.

methods.name: updatePackage
methods.description: Coordinates the download, extraction, installation, signature verification, and post-install steps for a package, handling errors at each stage.
